summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 7046 lux) and cloud levels (up 518 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1449 m), light levels (up 9262 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.4°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 517.9m lower than yesterday, 1078.3m lower than past week, 1449.4m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1355.4m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2430m and 2800m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Drizzle or light rain possible, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
